title: Review Vendor for Financial Risk
description: Before signing a large contract, a risk officer needs to assess the financial stability of a new vendor.

tasks.description: Pull a third-party financial risk report for the specified vendor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves the vendor's credit score and financial health report.

tasks.description: Analyze the report for any red flags, such as poor credit rating or pending litigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the report and finds no significant red flags.

tasks.description: Document the risk assessment and provide a recommendation to proceed with the contract.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the assessment and gives a 'low risk' recommendation.
